actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To amend Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003 to expand the areas of Federal land on which hazardous fuel reduction projects may be conducted under that Act.
short_title: Healthy Forests Restoration Amendments Act of 2008

summary.text: Healthy Forests Restoration Amendments Act of 2008 - Amends the Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003 to revise requirements with respect to the areas of federal land on which authorized hazardous fuel reduction projects may be conducted.

titles.title: Healthy Forests Restoration Amendments Act of 2008
To amend Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003 to expand the areas of Federal land on which hazardous fuel reduction projects may be conducted under that Act.
